==================
Site Search
==================

In April 2023, the universal site search was replaced with Google custom site search. The form library still uses Solr.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   google_custom_site_search_overview
   google_custom_site_search_config
   gcs_promotions
   gcs_enhancements
   gcs_autocomplete
